name: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
description:
Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed is a racing-arcade game developed by Electronic Arts Canada, Eden Games and Pocketeers. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Destination Software. Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed has a Metascore of 78, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed on Game Boy Advance, PlayStation and PC.
Allister Brimble, Dan Haigh, Manuel Lauvernier and Thomas Colin scored the game.
